  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:colos_sl/130179</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:colos_sl/130179</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Električno nihalo: Sprememba mase</string>
            <string language="en">Electrical pendulum: Variation of mass</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrisches Pendel: Variante der Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pendule électrique : Variation de la 
masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pêndulo elétrico: Variação da massa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pendolo elettrico: Variazione di massa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρικό εκκρεμές: Παραλλαγή της μάζας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Péndulo eléctrico: Variación de la masa</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Vpliv mase na periodo električnega nihala na primeru nihanja večih teles z različno maso.</string>
            <string language="en">Period and mass of electrical pendulum and determining the relation between them by observing oscillation of many bodies of unequal mass.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električno nihalo</string>
            <string language="en">electrical pendulum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">masa</string>
            <string language="en">mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">perioda</string>
            <string language="en">period</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mehanika</string>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Periode und Masse des elektrischen Pendels und 
der Bestimmung der Relation zwischen ihnen durch das Beobachten von 
von Pendelbewegung vieler Körper der ungleichen Masse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Période et masse de pendule électrique et de 
déterminer la relation entre eux en observant l'oscillation de 
beaucoup de corps de la masse inégale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Período e massa do pêndulo elétrico e de 
determinar a relação entre eles observando a oscilação de muitos 
corpos da massa desigual.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Periodo e massa di pendolo elettrico e di 
determinazione del rapporto fra loro osservando oscillazione di molti 
corpi di massa disuguale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περίοδος και μάζα του ηλεκτρικού εκκρεμούς και του 
καθορισμού της σχέσης μεταξύ τους με την παρατήρηση της 
ταλάντωσης πολλών οργανισμών της άνισης μάζας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Período y masa del péndulo eléctrico y de 
determinar la relación entre ellos observando la oscilación de 
muchos cuerpos de la masa desigual.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrisches Pendel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Periode</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pendule électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">période</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mécanique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pêndulo elétrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">massa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">período</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mecânicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">massa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">periodo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">meccanici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρικό εκκρεμές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μάζα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περίοδος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colos</string>
          </keyword>
